detached.translation[0].definitions[0].d: not reacting to or becoming involved in something in an emotional way
detached.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Try to take a more detached view.
She described what had happened in a cold and detached manner.
He appeared totally detached from the horrific nature of his crimes.
detached.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a detached house or garage is not joined to another building
detached.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a house or garage that is detached is not joined to another building on any side
